decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): CGW-24-ATB-PA-A-0001 REV A (LOCATION PLAN); CGW-24-ATB-PA-A-1021 REV A (EXISTING REAR ELEVATION); CGW-24-ATB-PA-A-2021 REV E (PROPOSED REAR ELEVATION); CGW-24-ATB-PA-A-1020 REV A (EXISTING FRONT ELEVATION); CGW-24-ATB-PA-A-2020 REV A (PROPOSED FRONT ELEVATION); CGW-24-ATB-PA-A-1001 REV A (EXISTING GROUND FLOOR PLAN); CGW-24-ATB-PA-A-2001 REV E (PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR PLAN); CGW-24-ATB-PA-A-1002 REV A (EXISTING FIRST FLOOR PLAN); CGW-24-ATB-PA-A-2002 REV A (PROPOSED FIRST FLOOR PLAN); CGW-24-ATB-PA-A-1003 REV A (EXISTING SECOND FLOOR PLAN); CGW-24-ATB-PA-A-2003 REV B (PROPOSED SECOND FLOOR PLAN); CGW-24-ATB-PA-A-1004 REV A (EXISTING ROOF PLAN); CGW-24-ATB-PA-A-2004 REV B (PROPOSED ROOF PLAN); CGW-24-ATB-PA-A-1030 REV A (EXISTING SECTION 1); CGW-67-BDN-PA-A-1031 REV A (EXISTING SECTION 2); CGW-24-ATB-PA-A-2000 REV A (EXISTING SITE BLOCK PLAN); CGW-24-ATB-PA-A-1000 REV A (EXISTING SITE PLAN); CGW-24-ATB-PA-A-2010 REV A (FIRE PLAN); CGW-67-BDN-PA-A-2031 REV A (PROPOSED SECTION); DESIGN AND ACCESS STATEMENT REV E 15/11/2023; CGW-24-ATB-PA-A-5000 REV C (CGI 1); CGW-24-ATB-PA-A-5001 (CGI 2)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Replacement double of glazed windows and doors to front elevation; installation of new windows and doors to rear elevation; replacement of glazed roof to existing single storey rear/side extension; alterations to single storey rear/side extension and existing back addition
